column5: Every year I look at the Canadian marine radio usage applications and still can't really figure them out.Does anyone know FOR SURE what channels pleasure boats can use while in Canada. I've already gone to various sights and none seem to be very clear on what channels we can use for boat to boat traffic. Maybe it's because I don't understand the terms used.This link is very specific for U.S. waters, but the chart above for Canada is not very clear at all.http://boating.ncf.ca/vhfchannels.htmlThanks,Pooch
Hi Pouch We used Channel 6. Itsme again
